name: loggifly
description: LoggiFly is a self-hosted aviation logbook system for pilots and aviators. It allows easy logging of flight time, aircraft, and route information with report generation and customization options.

features.title: Flight Logging
features.description: Track flight time, Aircraft details, Route information. Digital pilot logbook

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Flight reports, Hour summaries, Custom exports. Professional aviation records

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Privacy-focused, Own your data, Custom deployment. Control your flight records

features.title: Aircraft Management
features.description: Fleet tracking, Maintenance logs, Type ratings. Manage your aircraft

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: PDF reports, CSV export, Regulatory formats. Share and backup your logbook
